short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A time zone converter which allows you quickly convert a specific time to other time zones!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This time zone converter helps you quickly figure out what is the time around the world in your chosen time. You can use this converter to check the time before scheduling an appointment!
